text: 14:3 Onger Akaba 149:1; Aisaia 42:10; Akar Mogomem 5:9; 7:4; 15:3Ezɨ 144,000ɨn gumazamiziba, me Godɨn atrivir dabirabim ko 4plan bizir angamɨra itiba ko gumazir dapaniba, me men guamɨn tuivighav ikia ighiar igiar mam gami. Me nguazir kamɨn gumazamizir God ua ivezeziba, merara ighiar igiar kam gɨfo. Gumazamizir igharazitaba ua ighiar igiar kam gɨfoghan kogham.
